channel.title: A Software Distopia on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: I, For One, Welcome Self-Driving Microtransactions
item.description: You’re late for work. Again. It may be 2050 but to everyone’s dismay, offices are still a thing. You pack up your belongings and run out the door, barely stopping to kiss your wife goodbye.
